mapper.insert: insert into new_repository( new_id, new_caption, new_sub_title, publish_time, new_source, new_athors, new_key_word, new_editor, create_time, create_user, new_type, is_wheel, wheel_img, new_list_img1, new_list_img2, new_list_img3, new_content, new_url, is_publish, show_index, is_show_big_img ) values( #{newId}, #{newCaption}, #{newSubTitle}, #{publishTime}, #{newSource}, #{newAthors}, #{newKeyWord}, #{newEditor}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{newType}, #{isWheel}, #{wheelImg}, #{newListImg1}, #{newListImg2}, #{newListImg3}, #{newContent}, #{newUrl}, #{is_publish}, #{showIndex}, #{isShowBigImg} )
